description: You are building a detailed knowledge cards that synthesizes evidence on the effectiveness of humanitarian interventions to specifically achieve the following:

sections.instructions: Define this specific humanitarian outcome: Explain its relevance and importance in a humanitarian context, citing core policies, strategies, and guidance documents from leading humanitarian bodies.
sections.key_word: humanitarian outcome definition rationale UNHCR policy

sections.instructions: List and describe interventions that have strong, clear evidence of contributing to this outcome. For each intervention, present the information within a table using the PICO framework - P: Population & Problem Statement /I: Intervention Description / C: Comparison / O: Outcome & Evidence Synthesis. Then, in bullet points, for each potential intervention, provide a brief summary of the evidence base. Include key findings from past evaluations, meta-analyses, or research studies. Include references /url to the specific Evaluation reports where each evidences are presented.

Provide practical, actionable guidance on how to effectively implement each of the previously listed interventions. Include best practices, enabling factors, lessons learned, and recommendations from related past evaluations, policies and guidance (Include reference). Highlight critical success factors and common pitfalls to avoid.
sections.key_word: humanitarian implementation guidance best practices lessons learned

sections.instructions: Identify a set of robust and measurable KPIs for both output and outcome from UNHCR Result Framework that can be used to track progress and measure the achievement of this outcome. Explain why each indicator is a good proxy for measuring success. Present this within a formatted table
sections.key_word: UNHCR humanitarian outcome KPIs result framework

sections.instructions: Describe important cross-cutting issues that impact this specific outcome, such as gender equality, disability inclusion, accountability to affected population, localisation, and environmental sustainability. Explain how these should be integrated into program design and implementation.
sections.key_word: humanitarian cross-cutting issues gender disability environment

sections.instructions: Summarize the major challenges or knowledge gaps related to achieving this outcome. Suggest areas for further research, pilot programs, or policy development based on the lessons learned from previous interventions.
sections.key_word: humanitarian challenges future research policy gaps

sections.instructions: Provide an analysis of the cost-effectiveness of the described interventions. Compare the relative costs of different approaches to achieving the same outcome. Include any available data or benchmarks on value for money.
sections.key_word: humanitarian intervention cost-effectiveness value for money

sections.instructions: Discuss the long-term sustainability of the interventions. Outline potential exit strategies that ensure the continuation of positive outcomes after the program ends. Describe how local capacity can be built and strengthened to support a sustainable transition.
sections.key_word: humanitarian program sustainability exit strategy capacity building
